title: PSYC 308A Social Psychology - SOCIAL PSYC
description: Theory and research of individual social behaviour; social motivation; attitudes; group interaction; socialization; prejudice.
prerequisites: Either (a) PSYC 100 or (b) all of PSYC 101, PSYC 102. (or (c) 6 credits of 200-level Psychology (but not 205 or 263).)
